metadata.description: Core Islamic concepts for Knowledge Graph - Curated by scholarly methodology
metadata.curation_notes: Each concept includes Arabic terminology, English translation, root letters, and scholarly references

definition.arabic: الخوف من الجليل والعمل بالتنزيل والقناعة بالقليل والاستعداد ليوم الرحيل
definition.english: God-consciousness; mindfulness of Allah in all actions; protection from Divine displeasure through obedience

scholarly_references.note: Definition of muttaqeen (those with taqwa)
Chapter on Taqwa and its stations

definition.arabic: حبس النفس على المكروه والثبات عند المصيبة
definition.english: Patience, perseverance, steadfastness in times of trial and adversity

scholarly_references.note: Types of sabr: physical, spiritual, and against sin
Comprehensive treatise on patience

definition.arabic: الاعتراف بالنعمة ظاهرا وباطنا
definition.english: Gratitude to Allah; recognition of blessings with the heart, tongue, and actions

scholarly_references.note: If you are grateful, I will surely increase you

definition.arabic: الاعتماد على الله في جميع الأمور مع فعل الأسباب
definition.english: Complete reliance and trust in Allah while taking appropriate worldly means

scholarly_references.note: When you have decided, then rely upon Allah

definition.arabic: تصفية العمل من شوائب الشرك وإرادة وجه الله تعالى وحده
definition.english: Sincerity and purity of intention in worship; doing deeds solely for Allah's pleasure

scholarly_references.note: Actions are by intentions
Commanded only to worship Allah, sincere to Him in religion

definition.arabic: أن تعبد الله كأنك تراه فإن لم تكن تراه فإنه يراك
definition.english: Excellence in worship; to worship Allah as if you see Him, and if you cannot see Him, know that He sees you

scholarly_references.note: Hadith of Jibril defining Ihsan

definition.arabic: إعطاء كل ذي حق حقه والإنصاف
definition.english: Justice and fairness; giving each their due right without transgression or deficiency

scholarly_references.note: Allah commands justice

definition.arabic: رقة القلب والشفقة والعطف
definition.english: Mercy, compassion, and kindness toward all creation

scholarly_references.note: The merciful will be shown mercy by the Most Merciful

definition.arabic: الرجوع إلى الله بالندم على الذنب والإقلاع عنه والعزم على عدم العودة إليه
definition.english: Repentance to Allah; returning to Allah with regret, abandoning the sin, and resolve not to return to it

scholarly_references.note: Allah forgives all sins for those who repent

definition.arabic: الإعراض عن الدنيا وعدم التعلق بها مع القدرة عليها
definition.english: Detachment from worldly desires; not being attached to material possessions while having access to them

scholarly_references.note: Be in this world as if you were a stranger

definition.arabic: السكينة والخضوع والطمأنينة في الصلاة
definition.english: Tranquility, humility, and presence of heart in prayer

scholarly_references.note: Successful are the believers who have khushu in their prayer

definition.arabic: العلم الذي لا شك فيه
definition.english: Certainty of faith; knowledge that admits no doubt

scholarly_references.note: Worship until certainty (death) comes to you

definition.arabic: خلق يبعث على فعل الجميل وترك القبيح
definition.english: Modesty, shyness, and sense of shame that prevents one from evil

scholarly_references.note: Modesty brings nothing but good

definition.arabic: سعة الخير والإحسان
definition.english: Righteousness, piety, and comprehensive goodness in belief and action

scholarly_references.note: Comprehensive definition of righteousness

definition.arabic: إفراد الله بالعبادة والربوبية والأسماء والصفات
definition.english: Belief in the absolute Oneness and Uniqueness of Allah in His Lordship, worship, Names and Attributes

scholarly_references.work: Kitab al-Tawhid by Muhammad ibn Abd al-Wahhab
scholarly_references.note: Foundational text on Tawhid
Surah Al-Ikhlas - Declaration of Tawhid

definition.arabic: التصديق بالقلب والإقرار باللسان والعمل بالأركان
definition.english: Faith consisting of belief in the heart, declaration with the tongue, and action with the limbs

scholarly_references.note: Hadith of Jibril defining Iman

definition.arabic: حفظ الحقوق وأداؤها إلى أهلها
definition.english: Trustworthiness, honesty, and fulfilling responsibilities entrusted to one

scholarly_references.note: Allah commands you to render trusts to whom they are due

definition.arabic: مطابقة القول للواقع
definition.english: Truthfulness in speech and action; conformity of words to reality

scholarly_references.note: Truthfulness leads to righteousness

definition.arabic: ضبط النفس عند الغضب
definition.english: Forbearance, self-control, and patience in the face of provocation

scholarly_references.note: The strong is not the one who overcomes people by strength, but the one who controls himself while in anger

definition.arabic: ذكر الله باللسان والقلب
definition.english: Remembrance of Allah through the tongue and heart; constant awareness of Allah

scholarly_references.note: In the remembrance of Allah hearts find rest

definition.arabic: طلب المغفرة من الله
definition.english: Seeking Allah's forgiveness for sins committed

scholarly_references.note: I seek Allah's forgiveness 70 times a day

definition.arabic: السعي لاكتساب العلم الشرعي والنافع
definition.english: Seeking beneficial Islamic knowledge; pursuit of religious and worldly knowledge

scholarly_references.note: Seeking knowledge is obligatory upon every Muslim

definition.arabic: إخراج المال في سبيل الله
definition.english: Spending wealth in the way of Allah; charitable giving beyond obligatory zakat

scholarly_references.note: Parable of those who spend their wealth in Allah's way

definition.arabic: تقديم حاجة الغير على حاجة النفس
definition.english: Selflessness and altruism; preferring others' needs over one's own

scholarly_references.note: They prefer others over themselves even though poverty be upon them

definition.arabic: سؤال الله والتضرع إليه
definition.english: Supplication and calling upon Allah; invoking Allah with humility

scholarly_references.note: Dua is the essence of worship

definition.arabic: اللين في القول والفعل
definition.english: Gentleness and kindness in dealing with others; soft approach in speech and action

scholarly_references.note: Allah is Gentle and loves gentleness in all matters

definition.arabic: رابطة الأخوة الإيمانية بين المسلمين
definition.english: Islamic brotherhood; bond of faith connecting Muslims

scholarly_references.note: The Muslim is a brother of another Muslim

definition.arabic: الأمر بكل خير أمر به الشرع
definition.english: Enjoining what is good and right; commanding what is recognized as virtuous in Islam

scholarly_references.note: Let there arise from you a nation inviting to good

definition.arabic: النهي عن كل شر نهى عنه الشرع
definition.english: Forbidding what is evil and wrong; preventing what is prohibited in Islam

scholarly_references.note: Whoever sees evil should change it with his hand, tongue, or heart

definition.arabic: التوازن بين خوف عقاب الله ورجاء رحمته
definition.english: Balance between fear of Allah's punishment and hope in His mercy

scholarly_references.note: Those who fear the Hereafter and hope for the mercy of their Lord
